title: About Us
slogan: Build a trustable and accessible financial system
description.p1: Though Bitcoin has been the most dominant crypto asset, there isnâ€™t any related decentralized application due to its smart contract incapability, making a reliable investment pretty hard to find. This is true especially for new crypto investors. They fear to take the token risk and custodial risk because we all witnessed the devastating collapse of crypto unicorns happened in 2022.
description.p2: Sefo Finance Lake is founded in July 2022. By leveraging Stacks & discreet log contracts technology, we're building the world's first non-custodial vault for Bitcoin holders. They can now easily subscribe to our DeFi products to store & to grow Bitcoin securely.
